author: timbeiko
content: <@!462798252543049728> you pay `baseFee + priorityFee` multiplied by `gasUsed`. Often times, the `gasUsed` is lower for failed transactions than non-failed ones (e.g. a failed NFT mint will cost you much less because the contracts only checks that the mint is over vs. creating the NFT and assigning to you, so it uses less gas)

author: johnnycagewins
content: thanks a lot for the explanation!
